last_episode_to_air.name: Change Your Mind
last_episode_to_air.overview: Steven faces his biggest challenge yet.

name: Steven Universe
overview: A young boy takes his mother's place in a group of gemstone-based beings, and must learn to control his powers.

episodes.name: Gem Glow
episodes.overview: Steven gets depressed when his favorite ice-cream sandwich brand, Cookie Cat, has been taken off the market. He soon cheers up when the Gems manage to get a hold of some of the last remaining Cookie Cats, which Steven believes may hold the key to activating his gem.

episodes.name: Laser Light Cannon
episodes.overview: When a menacing red eye is about to hit Beach City, the only thing that can destroy it is a Laser Light Cannon which once belonged to Steven's mother, Rose Quartz. Thus, Steven enlists the help of his father, Greg, and they search through his storage for the cannon.

episodes.name: Cheeseburger Backpack
episodes.overview: The Gems go on a mission to place a Moon Goddess statue on top of the ruined Lunar Sea Spire, and Steven tries to prove he can be useful with the help of his new novelty cheeseburger backpack.

episodes.name: Together Breakfast
episodes.overview: Steven's attempt to get the Gems to share his special breakfast tradition lands him on a journey through their ancient Gem temple.

episodes.name: Frybo
episodes.overview: Steven brings a mascot costume to life with a magic shard owned by Pearl to help his friend Peedee with his job, but it backfires when the mascot goes rogue.

episodes.name: Cat Fingers
episodes.overview: Steven tries to master his shapeshifting abilities from Amethyst, but turns his fingers into cats, making it harder to do things.

episodes.name: Bubble Buddies
episodes.overview: Steven creates a magic bubble around himself and a girl he likes, Connie, to save her from a falling rock, but has no idea how to make it disappear.

episodes.name: Serious Steven
episodes.overview: While navigating out of an ancient Gem maze, Steven tries to prove himself worthy to Garnet by being serious.

episodes.name: Tiger Millionaire
episodes.overview: Steven joins an underground wrestling league with Amethyst, who is tired of Pearl and Garnet bringing her down.

episodes.name: Steven's Lion
episodes.overview: Steven befriends a magical lion he finds in the desert during a mission with the Gems.

episodes.name: Arcade Mania
episodes.overview: Steven takes the Gems on his own kind of adventure by bringing them to the Fun Land Arcade, where Garnet soon becomes enchanted by a dancing game.

episodes.name: Giant Woman
episodes.overview: Steven urges Amethyst and Pearl to fuse together into a four-armed "giant woman" named Opal (Aimee Mann). Amethyst and Pearl, however, keep on quarrelling.

episodes.name: So Many Birthdays
episodes.overview: After learning that the Gems are thousands of years old, Steven decides to make up for all the birthdays they've missed.

episodes.name: Lars and the Cool Kids
episodes.overview: Steven and Lars get to hang out with the cool kids (Jenny Pizza, Buck Dewey and Sour Cream) in town, but their teenage shenanigans get them into magical trouble.

episodes.name: Onion Trade
episodes.overview: A toy trade between Steven and Onion escalates into epic proportions.

episodes.name: Steven the Sword Fighter
episodes.overview: Pearl gets injured and retreats into her gem to heal and make a new body to project after she tries to teach Steven the art of sword-fighting using a holographic version of herself.

episodes.name: Lion 2: The Movie
episodes.overview: Steven and Connie try to ride Lion to the movie theater, but Lion has other plans.

episodes.name: Beach Party
episodes.overview: After a battle damages the Fish Stew Pizza sign, the Gems are banned from the restaurant, so Steven throws a cookout on the beachside to mend the relationship between the Pizza family and the Gems.

episodes.name: Rose's Room
episodes.overview: Steven's desire for some alone time unlocks a new room in the Temple that answers his every wish.

episodes.name: Coach Steven
episodes.overview: Against Pearl's wishes, Steven becomes determined to get stronger after watching Garnet and Amethyst fuse into the mighty Sugilite.

episodes.name: Joking Victim
episodes.overview: Steven works at the Big Donut when Lars leaves Sadie with all the work.

episodes.name: Steven and the Stevens
episodes.overview: Steven needs a musical partner for an upcoming show, so he uses a time travel device to recruit himself as the perfect bandmate.

episodes.name: Monster Buddies
episodes.overview: Steven attempts to tame a monster's wild form when he accidentally releases it from its gem bubble.

episodes.name: An Indirect Kiss
episodes.overview: Steven tells Connie about his mission with the Gems to heal Amethyst after she cracks her gemstone.

episodes.name: Mirror Gem
episodes.overview: Steven befriends a magical mirror that can mysteriously communicate with only him and ends up setting free its trapped inhabitant, a Gem named Lapis Lazuli.

episodes.name: Ocean Gem
episodes.overview: Lapis Lazuli disappears after reigniting a past conflict with Garnet, Amethyst and Pearl, and takes the ocean along with her, leaving Beach City in a panic on the first day of summer. Steven, Connie, Greg, Lion and the Gems go on a mission to confront Lapis and set things back to normal.

episodes.name: House Guest
episodes.overview: Left homeless and with a broken leg after the events of the previous episode, Greg stays with Steven and the Gems as a temporary house guest and unintentionally interferes with Steven's healing powers.

episodes.name: Space Race
episodes.overview: Steven, Pearl and Greg work together to build a spaceship so that Pearl can revisit the wonders of the cosmos, but Pearl gets a little carried away.

episodes.name: Secret Team
episodes.overview: After they accidentally pop a bubble containing gem shards, Steven, Amethyst and Pearl form a secret team to retrieve the shards before Garnet finds out.

episodes.name: Island Adventure
episodes.overview: Steven tries to mend Lars' and Sadie's friendship by taking them on vacation to a magical beach.

episodes.name: Keep Beach City Weird!
episodes.overview: Steven is taken in by Ronaldo's conspiracy theories about paranormal occurrences in Beach City.

episodes.name: Fusion Cuisine
episodes.overview: Steven asks the Gems to fuse together and pretend to be his mother at dinner with Connie's family.

episodes.name: Garnet's Universe
episodes.overview: Steven interprets what Garnet did during the day after a recent mission.

episodes.name: Watermelon Steven
episodes.overview: Steven grows a patch of watermelons shaped like himself, but they soon come to life and attack people.

episodes.name: Lion 3: Straight to Video
episodes.overview: Lion keeps lying on Steven's face while he's sleeping. This leads to Steven discovering a pocket dimension in Lion's mane.

episodes.name: Warp Tour
episodes.overview: Steven becomes uneasy after seeing an unknown object traversing through a warp stream, despite the Gems' attempts to disprove his claims.

episodes.name: Alone Together
episodes.overview: While practicing how to fuse with Gems, Steven accidentally fuses with Connie, forming a half-human and half-Gem, human fusion called Stevonnie.

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: Steven finds out that the Lunar Sea Spire mission from the third episode was a test and demands a new one.

episodes.name: Future Vision
episodes.overview: Steven learns that Garnet can see into the future and becomes paranoid about the possible dangers around him.

episodes.name: On the Run
episodes.overview: Steven and Amethyst try life out on the road. During so, Amethyst reveals a dark secret about herself and the Gems to Steven.

episodes.name: Horror Club
episodes.overview: Steven goes to the lighthouse to watch scary movies with Ronaldo, Lars and Sadie.

episodes.name: Winter Forecast
episodes.overview: Steven has to take Connie back to her home before a blizzard hits Beach City, and Garnet shows him some outcomes before they leave.

episodes.name: Maximum Capacity
episodes.overview: While cleaning out Greg's storage unit, Greg and Amethyst are reunited with their favorite sitcom Li'l Butler.

episodes.name: Marble Madness
episodes.overview: When several droids from space descend towards warp pad zones, Steven and the Gems attempt to track down their purposes.

episodes.name: Rose's Scabbard
episodes.overview: Pearl takes Steven to a special place that belonged to Rose Quartz after Lion finds the scabbard for Rose's sword.

episodes.name: The Message
episodes.overview: Steven and the Gems need Greg's help to retrieve a message from the Wailing Stone.

episodes.name: Political Power
episodes.overview: The Gems cause a power outage in Beach City, and Steven helps Mayor Dewey with damage control.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.overview: Peridot and her new partner, Jasper, arrive on Earth.

episodes.name: Jail Break
episodes.overview: Trapped on Peridot's ship, Steven attempts to rescue the Gems from the Homeworld's clutches, including two Gems named Ruby and Sapphire.

episodes.name: Full Disclosure
episodes.overview: Steven tries to avoid Connie so he won't have to tell her about his ordeal with the Homeworld Gems from the previous episodes.

episodes.name: Open Book
episodes.overview: When Connie is upset by the ending of her favorite book series, Steven takes her to Rose Quartz's room, where they remake the ending.

episodes.name: Joy Ride
episodes.overview: Buck, Jenny and Sour Cream take Steven out on a late-night joyride to lift his spirits and teach him how to have fun, until they end up discovering Peridot's escape pod.

episodes.name: Say Uncle
episodes.overview: In this non-canon episode, Uncle Grandpa arrives to aid Steven in unlocking the power of his gem.

episodes.name: Story for Steven
episodes.overview: Greg tells Steven the story of when he first met Rose Quartz.

episodes.name: Shirt Club
episodes.overview: Steven and Buck make T-shirts.

episodes.name: Love Letters
episodes.overview: When Jamie the mailman falls in love with Garnet, Steven and Connie must help turn him down gently.

episodes.name: Reformed
episodes.overview: Amethyst keeps trying to find a new form to regenerate into while she, Steven and Garnet chase after a monster loose in the Temple.

episodes.name: Sworn to the Sword
episodes.overview: Wanting to protect Steven, Connie takes up swordfighting lessons with Pearl.

episodes.name: Rising Tides, Crashing Skies
episodes.overview: Ronaldo investigates the Crystal Gems in a web documentary for his "Keep Beach City Weird" blog.

episodes.name: Keeping it Together
episodes.overview: While the Crystal Gems chase after Peridot in the Kindergarten, Steven and Garnet discover a dark secret while exploring its inner workings.

episodes.name: We Need to Talk
episodes.overview: After witnessing Steven and Connie fuse again, Greg explains to them how he learned about gem fusion from his time with Rose Quartz, hoping to pull it off himself in order to grow closer to her.

episodes.name: Chille Tid
episodes.overview: Garnet has Pearl and Amethyst stay with Steven, who is exhausted from searching for Malachite in the ocean with the Gems, for a slumber party. However, Steven is rattled by recurring dreams of Lapis Lazuli.

episodes.name: Cry for Help
episodes.overview: When TV broadcasts are disrupted by a video signal emitted by Peridot from a Gem communication tower, Garnet chooses to fuse with Pearl into Sardonyx to destroy it, which dismays Amethyst. As the tower keeps being fixed, however, Steven and Amethyst are shocked to discover who's really behind it.

episodes.name: Keystone Motel
episodes.overview: While she accompanies Greg and Steven on a road trip to another state and a visit to a motel in that state, Garnet's frustration with what Pearl did in the previous episode causes her to split into Ruby and Sapphire.

episodes.name: Onion Friend
episodes.overview: When they visit Onion's house, Amethyst rekindles her friendship with his mother, Vidalia, while he shows Steven around his room.

episodes.name: Historical Friction
episodes.overview: Steven is asked by Jamie to participate in a play funded by Mayor Dewey about Beach City's founding, with Pearl stepping in to provide a more historically accurate script.

episodes.name: Friend Ship
episodes.overview: After the recent events, Pearl wants to redeem herself by capturing Peridot, who traps the Crystal Gems in an old, abandoned Gem spaceship.

episodes.name: Nightmare Hospital
episodes.overview: Steven and Connie must sneak into a hospital to retrieve Rose Quartz's sword from Connie's mother.

episodes.name: Sadie's Song
episodes.overview: Steven helps Sadie with an act for the annual Beach City Beach-a-Palooza.

episodes.name: Catch and Release
episodes.overview: The Crystal Gems finally capture Peridot, but Steven suspects that she knows something and lets her live in his bathroom.

episodes.name: When It Rains
episodes.overview: After Steven explains Earth's workings, including rainstorms, to Peridot, she takes Steven to the Kindergarten to tell him more about the Cluster.

episodes.name: Back to the Barn
episodes.overview: The Crystal Gems and Peridot go to the family barn to build a gem drill that can take them to the Cluster's location. However, when Peridot and Pearl fight over who will lead the project, Steven suggests they build robots and compete with each other.

episodes.name: Too Far
episodes.overview: Peridot gets carried away with gem gossip, and unintentionally really hurts Amethyst's feelings.

episodes.name: The Answer
episodes.overview: Garnet finally tells Steven the story of how she came to be a Crystal Gem.

episodes.name: Steven's Birthday
episodes.overview: Steven has a birthday party out at the barn, and decides he has some growing up to do.

episodes.name: It Could've Been Great
episodes.overview: The Gems take a trip to the moon.

episodes.name: Message Received
episodes.overview: Steven has doubts about believing in everyone.

episodes.name: Log Date 7 15 2
episodes.overview: Steven sneaks a listen to a friends audio diary.

episodes.name: Super Watermelon Island
episodes.overview: Steven discovers what happened to his sentient watermelons.

episodes.name: Gem Drill
episodes.overview: Steven travels deep underground.

episodes.name: Same Old World
episodes.overview: Steven and Lapis Lazuli go on an adventure.

episodes.name: Barn Mates
episodes.overview: Steven helps two friends get along at the barn.

episodes.name: Hit the Diamond
episodes.overview: When an envoy of Rubies arrive, Steven proposes a game of baseball.

episodes.name: Steven Floats
episodes.overview: Steven discovers he has a new power while seeking a fresh doughnut.

episodes.name: Drop Beat Dad
episodes.overview: Steven helps Sour Cream put on a show.

episodes.name: Mr. Greg
episodes.overview: Steven visits Empire City with Greg and Pearl.

episodes.name: Too Short to Ride
episodes.overview: Steven and Amethyst take a trip to Funland but run into trouble when their friend is too short to ride the rollercoasters.

episodes.name: The New Lars
episodes.overview: Steven gets a new look into Lars' life.

episodes.name: Beach City Drift
episodes.overview: Steven and Connie get into a high-speed car race with their biggest foe.

episodes.name: Restaurant Wars
episodes.overview: Steven settles a rivalry between restaurant owners.

episodes.name: Kikis Pizza Delivery Service
episodes.overview: Kiki has nightmares and Steven intervenes.

episodes.name: Monster Reunion
episodes.overview: An old friend returns.

episodes.name: Alone at Sea
episodes.overview: Steven and Greg take Lapis on a boat trip out to sea and find themselves in dangerous water.

episodes.name: Greg the Babysitter
episodes.overview: Greg tells Steven the story of the time he and Rose babysat Sour Cream for Vidalia.

episodes.name: Gem Hunt
episodes.overview: Steven, Pearl and Connie go to the Great North to hunt down a corrupted gem.

episodes.name: Crack the Whip
episodes.overview: Amethyst looks after Steven and Connie while Pearl and Garnet look for Jasper's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Steven vs. Amethyst
episodes.overview: Steven And Amethyst compete against each other while training with Pearl.

episodes.name: Bismuth
episodes.overview: Steven discovers something the Gems thought was lost to the past inside of Lion's mane.

episodes.name: Beta
episodes.overview: Steven and Amethyst visit some friends in the country but Amethyst isn't being herself.

episodes.name: Earthlings
episodes.overview: Amethyst tries to exact revenge with a showdown in the Kindergarten.

episodes.name: Back to the Moon
episodes.overview: Steven and the Gems revisit the Moon Base.

episodes.name: Bubbled
episodes.overview: Steven gets marooned in his bubble.

episodes.name: Kindergarten Kid
episodes.overview: Steven and Peridot attempt to catch an elusive speedy corrupted Gem monster in the Beta Kindergarten.

episodes.name: Know Your Fusion
episodes.overview: Steven and the Gems examine fusions.

episodes.name: Buddy's Book
episodes.overview: Steven visits the library with Connie and uncovers a long lost book.

episodes.name: Mindful Education
episodes.overview: Steven and Connie learn to focus better.

episodes.name: Future Boy Zoltron
episodes.overview: Steven tells people's fortunes at Funland.

episodes.name: Last One Out of Beach City
episodes.overview: Pearl, Steven and Amethyst go to a rock show.

episodes.name: Onion Gang
episodes.overview: Steven learns about Onion's secret group of friends.

episodes.name: Gem Harvest
episodes.overview: In this double episode Stevens autumn visit to the barn brings a new stranger into his life.

episodes.name: Three Gems and a Baby
episodes.overview: Greg tells Steven about their first winter together

episodes.name: Steven's Dream
episodes.overview: A strange dream prompts Steven to search for answers.

episodes.name: Adventures in Light Distortion
episodes.overview: Steven and the Gems take off on a search and recovery mission.

episodes.name: Gem Heist
episodes.overview: The Gems reach a space station that once belonged to Pink Diamond, and sneak in to rescue Greg, but in order to do so, they must play the roles they were made for, so as not to arouse suspicion.

episodes.name: The Zoo
episodes.overview: Steven finds Greg in Pink Diamond's "Human Zoo", and tries to look for a way out. This proves easier said than done as the humans there are guided through a strictly scheduled and regimented life

episodes.name: That Will Be All
episodes.overview: While Blue Diamond and Yellow Diamond argue over their diverging ways of coping with Pink Diamond's death, Steven, Greg and the Crystal Gems attempt to escape the space station before they are discovered.

episodes.name: The New Crystal Gems
episodes.overview: Connie tells Steven the story of how she, Peridot, and Lapis attempted to take the Crystal Gems' places as the protectors of Beach City while he was in space.

episodes.name: Storm in the Room
episodes.overview: Steven uses his room in the temple to create a simulated image of Rose Quartz in order to try to experience what it would be like to know his mother. He ends up confronting her with his troubled feelings about her complex legacy and her choice to create him.

episodes.name: Rocknaldo
episodes.overview: Ronaldo decides to join the Crystal Gems. However, once Steven lets him join the team, Ronaldo's self-centered attitude begins to try Steven's patience.

episodes.name: Tiger Philanthropist
episodes.overview: When Amethyst quits wrestling at the abandoned warehouse, Steven continues doing so himself as Tiger Philanthropist. However, Steven soon begins to doubt the point of wrestling when the audience doesn't take to his new persona.

episodes.name: Room for Ruby
episodes.overview: "Navy", one of the Rubies who came to Earth to find Jasper, crashes on Earth and is welcomed in by Steven to be a Crystal Gem. However, Lapis Lazuli does not trust Navy's overly optimistic nature, knowing of her previous encounters with her.

episodes.name: Lion 4: Alternate Ending
episodes.overview: Steven tries to search for secret messages Rose may have left him about his "magical destiny". Lion eventually leads him to a tapebut it's just an alternate version of the message from Rose he's already seen.

episodes.name: Doug Out
episodes.overview: Steven and Connie join Connie's father on a stake out.

episodes.name: The Good Lars
episodes.overview: Steven, Lars and Sadie get invited to a party with the Cool Kids.

episodes.name: Are You My Dad?
episodes.overview: People disappearing from Beach City, and Steven tries to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: I Am My Mom
episodes.overview: Steven struggles to fix his mistakes.

episodes.name: Stuck Together
episodes.overview: Steven and Lars are stuck inside Topaz and try to look for a way to escape.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Steven goes to court against Blue and Yellow Diamond to determine his (or rather Rose Quartz's) fate.

episodes.name: Off Colors
episodes.overview: After escaping from the Diamonds, Steven and Lars encounter and befriend the "off-colors", a group of "defective" Gems who live in hiding from Gem society. Lars defends them from security robots but is critically injured in the process.

episodes.name: Lars' Head
episodes.overview: After Steven brings Lars back to life with his healing powers, he discovers that Lars now shares the same powers as Lion.

episodes.name: Dewey Wins
episodes.overview: Steven helps Mayor Dewey run a difficult campaign.

episodes.name: Gemcation
episodes.overview: Greg and the Gems take Steven on vacation to help him relax.

episodes.name: Raising the Barn
episodes.overview: Pumpkin goes missing.

episodes.name: Back to the Kindergarten
episodes.overview: Steven, Amethyst, and Peridot try to spruce up the Kindergarten.

episodes.name: Sadie Killer
episodes.overview: Steven and the Cool Kids start a band, but they have trouble finding their sound.

episodes.name: Kevin Party
episodes.overview: Kevin is throwing a party, and Steven is invited.

episodes.name: Lars of the Stars
episodes.overview: Lars rises to the occasion.

episodes.name: Jungle Moon
episodes.overview: Stevonnie finds themself alone on an adventure.

episodes.name: Your Mother and Mine
episodes.overview: Steven takes Garnet to meet some of his new friends.

episodes.name: The Big Show
episodes.overview: Steven shoots a documentary that follows a local band as they get their first big break.

episodes.name: Pool Hopping
episodes.overview: Garnet and Steven explore the most unlikely timelines in Beach City.

episodes.name: Letters to Lars
episodes.overview: Steven writes about the latest news of Beach City.

episodes.name: Can't Go Back
episodes.overview: Ronaldo spots something mysterious on the moon, and Steven goes to investigate.

episodes.name: A Single Pale Rose
episodes.overview: Steven helps Pearl find her cell phone.

episodes.name: Now We're Only Falling Apart
episodes.overview: Followed by hearing about the revelation, many problems ensue within the crystal gems' relationships.

episodes.name: What's Your Problem?
episodes.overview: Amethyst convinces Steven to take a break after all he's been through.

episodes.name: The Question
episodes.overview: Ruby decides to explore her own life separate from Sapphire, and has a Wild West adventure as a lonesome cowboy with the help of Steven, Amethyst, and Greg.

episodes.name: Made of Honor
episodes.overview: As Ruby and Sapphire plan their wedding, Sapphire wishes that their friends from the war could be there to see it.

episodes.name: Reunited
episodes.overview: The wedding of Ruby and Sapphire, with the Gems and several Beach City citizens in attendance, goes without a hitch and Garnet reforms.

episodes.name: Legs From Here to Homeworld
episodes.overview: Steven tells Blue and Yellow Diamond that their final attack on the Earth corrupted the remaining Gems on the planet, instead of destroying them outright as intended.

episodes.name: Familiar
episodes.overview: White Diamond believes that Steven is Pink Diamond, so Steven tries to fit Pink's part so that way he can get close enough to White to ask her about helping the corrupted gems on Earth.

episodes.name: Together Alone
episodes.overview: Steven throws a party to bring his family together.

episodes.name: Escapism
episodes.overview: Steven uses his psychic powers to find help.

episodes.name: Change Your Mind
episodes.overview: Steven faces his biggest challenge yet.
